mapper.select: select id,space_id,booking_date,booking_time,status from jn_appointment where user_number = #{userNumber} and status!=3
select * from jn_appointment where id = #{id} and status!=3
mapper.insert: insert into jn_appointment (space_id, user_number, status, create_time, booking_date) values ( #{spaceId}, #{userNumber}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{bookingDate})
mapper.update: update jn_appointment set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
update jn_appointment set status=3 where id=#{id}
